name: Flippy Crab
description:
Will you help Flippy Crab get home, passing through a maze of deadly seaweeds?   INTRODUCTION

Flippy Crab is basically another Flappy Bird clone. Just like many beginning game developers, it is also my first ever game. It is currently still in a in-development stage. When it is completed, I want it to be one of the best Flappy Bird clones ever! Please help and support by playing the game, leaving comments and reviews, and donate so I can buy better in-game assets.

 

CONTROLS

 - Mouse Left-click : push Flippy Crab upwards

 

UPDATE HISTORY & ROADMAP

 - v 0.1 (current version) : Extremely barebones game completed.

 - v0.2 : Add sound effects whenever Flippy Crab jumps. Add explosion effects (with sound) on Flippy Crab's death.

 - v0.3 : Add return to start screen option in pause and game over screen. Add sound sound control option in main menu and pause screen.

 - v0.4 : Multiple obstacle patterns and difficulty increase with game progress.

 - v0.5 : Add online leaderboards.

 - v0.6 : Improve general in-game effects.

 - v0.7 : Improve general UI effects.

 - v0.8 : Remaster graphics for high-resolution mobile device.

 - v0.9 : Improve sound and music.

 - v1.0 : Full commercial version - Launch on Android marketplaces (such as Google Play Store) with full store assets and in-game ADs for monetization. All donation contributors will have there names on the in-game credit page.
